author: veithen
msg: WSCOMMONS-412: Deprecated DocumentBuilderFactoryImpl and DocumentBuilderImpl and created two new classes DOOMDocumentBuilderFactory and DOOMDocumentBuilder without the setDOOMRequired and schema hacks. This allows us to get rid of the hacks (and have JAXP compliant implementations) without breaking existing code.
